data.name: Actions
desc: This constant set contains possible actions that could be approved by ActionsApproval implementation.

items.name: PREVENT_CLOSE
lines: \"Prevent Close\" - throws veto exception if target object is going to close.
Usually a com.sun.star.util.XCloseListener implementation could use this constant to request approval to throw veto exception.

items.name: PREVENT_TERMINATION
lines: \"Prevent Termination\" - throws veto exception if target object is going to terminate.
Usually a com.sun.star.frame.XTerminateListener implementation could use this constant to request approval to throw veto exception.
